cast.name: 瑞克森·格雷西 Rickson Gracie
马斯洛·阿兰瑟 Marcelo Alonso

introduction: The Biography Channel celebrates the life of Helio GracieIn 2010, the Biography Channel released a documentary about Grand Master Helio Gracie. This documentary is an incredible insight into the lives of one of the founders of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. Grand Master Helio played a crucial role in our arts. The documentary is in Brazilian Portuguese but the subtitles (which you can add by clicking the CC button) are in English. Be sure to take advantage of this great opportunity to have a better understanding of Jiu-Jitsu!youtube 葡语英字观看地址：https://youtu.be/jo6sG1UqQAsbilibili 葡语中字观看地址：https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1ZJ411b73r?from=search&seid=17584659989771565495补充阅读 格雷西家族介绍：https://graciebarra.com/why-gracie-barra/heritage/
